page.title: 16WEST HORNDON SCHOOL
page.content: West Horndon has its own primary school, which takes children aged from 4 to 11. The school is modern, 22 years old, and has good facilities and pleasant surroundings. The school has 7 classrooms. At one time there were 234 children, but now there are only 71 children. Only 3 classrooms are used for schoolwork. The others are used as a library, a music room, a maths and science room and a play group. There are 3 fulltime teachers, including the head, and two days of parttime. The school has chickens, ducks, other birds, rabbits and a pond, which are looked after by the children. The school has a large playing field and an average sized playground. There is also a good sized hall with much P.E. equipment.
